From: ' 
To:' " , 
11 
Subject: RE: updates 
Date: Sat, 06 Jul 2019 22:00:04 +0000 
Importance: Normal 
Awesome, thanks! I'll loop you in if I get any calls from the search team. I spoke to the agents doing the approaches of 
alaxwell/R our agents are doing the other approaches) today, so they should call us with 
updates tonight. 
From: 
Sent: Saturday, July 6, 2019 5:56 PM 
To: 
Subject: FW: updates 
I'm logged on remotely and available to write supplemental warrants if the FBI finds additional items that we want to 
seize. Also happy to help with anything else that may come up. 
From: Berman, Geoffrey (USANYS) 
Sent: Saturday, July 6, 2019 5:54 PM 
To: 
I 
Cc: 
(U 
•=>; •=>: 
< 
Subject: Re: updates 
Epstein is in custody. Search warrants being executed now. Geoff 
On Jul 6, 2019, at 12:44 PM, Berman, Geoffrey (USANYS) 
< 
wrote: 
ells me that he is confirmed on board. Wheels up. Geoff 
On Jul 6, 2019, at 11:10 AM, •z:> wrote: 
Good morning all—
M
asked me to pass along two quick updates. First, Judge Moses signed the search warrant this morning. 
Second, our case agent told us that FBI received a flight manifest from CBP last night. The passengers listed are 
Epstein and two pilots. Of course, that is subject to change, and I'm told that FBI will try to get confirmation of the 
passengers after the flight takes off. 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
(212) 637-2225 
EFTA00028381

EFTA00028382
